text:
@rahulkanwal @Gallup @narendramodi @PMOIndia And your options for the people you asked the question will be:
How much you satisfied with the steps taken by government to fight COVID19 ?
1. 100% satisfied
2. Fully satisfied
3. Yes 
4. Not satisfied (Note: selecting this will same as declaring yourself anti national)
